body: So many people love you. Don't focus on the people who don't
author: soyen

body: Don't let little stupid things break your happiness
You deserve a life full of happinness and positivity
Always be a little kinder than necessary
Be so happy that when others look at you, they become happy too
Decorate your life with hearts that make yours stronger
author: Debby Ryan

body: Being happy with yourself is the best kind of happiness
author: faraway

body: The most important thing is to enjoy your life — to be happy — it’s all that matters.
author: Audrey Hepburn

body: Start your day with positive thoughts
You deserve to laugh. To be happy. To live a joyful life. You deserve to experience moments of pure beauty and bliss.
author: Nicole Addison

body: Life is only as good as your mindset
Choose your happiness over everything
Don't stop until you're proud
Never regret a day in your life: good days give happiness, bad days give experience, worst days give lessons, and best days give memories
Very little is needed to make a happy life
Start each day with a grateful heart
Next time when you think of beautiful things, don't forget to count yourself in
You > The World
Don't fill your head with worries, there won't be room for anything else!
A Positive mind will give you a positive life
Do more of what makes you happy
Be honest with yourself
You don’t deserve a paragraph. You deserve a thousand books written about how amazing you are.
The little things? The little moments? They aren’t little.
author: John Zabat-Zinn

body: Let us dance in the sun, wearing wild flowers in our hair...
author: Susan Polis Schutz

body: I want you to be happy because you deserve it. I want you to be happy, because it makes me happy to see you, the way you were meant to be
author: Mark Anthony

body: Walk as if you are kissing the Earth with your feet.
author: Thich Nhat Hanh

body: The only thing that stops you is you
A smile does not waste electricity, and generates much more light.
There will always be someone who thinks you can't succeed. Make sure that someone isn't you.
It's kind of fun to do the impossible
author: Walt Disney

body: All our dreams can come true, if we have the courage to pursue them
author: Walt Disney

body: The more you like yourself, the less you are like anyone else, which makes you unique
author: Walt Disney

body: Doing what you like is freedom. Liking what you do is happiness
author: Frank Tyger

body: Life is full of happiness and tears; be strong and have faith
author: Kareena Kapoor Khan

body: Happiness is not something you postpone for the future; it is something you design for the present
author: Jim Rohn

body: Spend your free time the way you like, not the way you think you’re supposed to.
author: Susan Cain

body: Thoughts are real actions, be careful to choose the best ones.
author: São Fernandes

body: Happiness comes when you find meaning in your life. If that envolve helping other people, even better.
We just have one shot at life and you are the person that is gonna decide how the journey will be.
Failure is simply the opportunity to begin again, this time more intelligently.
author: Henry Ford

body: You don't know how lovely you are.
If you think you can, you will
Life is short. If there was ever a moment to follow your passion and do something that matters to you, that moment is now.
Metanl health first, everything else will follow.
Be patient. The best things happen unexpectedly
Never regret anything that once made you smile
A small act of kindness creates the greatest of joys.
And they keep asking me where happiness can be found, but I'm no longer trying to find happiness I just appreciate where I am and then happiness finds me.
author: soyen

body: Be kind to yourself!
You are lovely.
Don't just be good to others. Be good to yourself!
Smile!
If it makes you happy, it doesn't have to make sense to others.
